title: Zoe not in store?
body: Haven been grinding for a long ass time to buy zoe when she comes out and she is out, BUT she is not in the store for me. but people are playing her. any info? was she disabled? if so anybody know when she will be back?

replies.body: She's on PBE. Expect release inc 3-4 weeks.
She's on PBE, in beta ATM, still, just cancel this champ or change the voice, I tried her on my friends PBE account, I SWEAR her voice was the right motivation to shoot myself
So you don't like her personality? Then don't buy or play her. Riot does not cater to *only* you.

> [{quoted}](name=FamiREE Vocals ,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VvJREu9W,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2017-11-08T21:05:44.553+0000)
>
> So you don't like her personality? Then don't buy or play her. Riot does not cater to *only* you.

At least let us mute a single champs voices, seriously, why have a minecraft squeaker voice a champ?

"minecraft squeaker"

Do you understand that people with high pitched voices cannot control it naturally? Better pray you don't have a daughter then.
so, is PBE a testing server? orrr... Like could i create an account on that server region and play her without buying her?
you have infinite RP and IP on the server, it's a test server and it's rather laggy.
Also you have not been "grinding for a long ass time", she was first announced on like 5 days ago
Zoe is not available on live this patch. She's only available to play on PBE.
